PrecisOrder directing that a review be undertaken of the investment by MAGIC LANTERN GROUP, INC., to acquire control of the Canadian business carried on by Magic Lantern Communications Ltd., Magic Vision Media Inc., Tutor Buddy Inc., Sonoptic Technologies, Inc., (collectively "Magic Lantern"), at Oakville, Ontario.
